lyrics:
9 contributorssynthesizer lyricsverse 1
fake your way through a conversation
tell her all the things you wish were true
maybe youre the voice of a generation
and a princess somewhere waits for you

prechorus
but if youre never gonna change the world
if youre never gonna be a movie star
if youre never gonna change the world
maybe youre looking too hard

chorus
dont synthesizer her
dont redesign her
shes no prize for
a synthesizer

verse 2

add another name below your list
maybe youre the next world wide sensation
you probably know a thousand ones like this

prechorus
but if youre never gonna change the world
if youre never gonna be a movie star
if youre never gonna change the world
maybe youre looking too hard
you might also likechorus
dont synthesizer her
dont redesign her
shes no prize for
a synthesizer

bridge
who you gonna call when the spotlight flickers
what you gonna do when your curtain falls
maybe you can make them not remember her
maybe you wont end up alone

chorus
dont synthesizer her synthesizer her
dont redesign her
shes no prize for shes no prize for
a synthesizer a synthesizer a synthesizer
